name: Ryan Holden
text: Not a terrible experience. Food was delicious. A long wait to get my food compared to other D'Angelo locations. Nothing that would deter me from visiting again. I may use the call ahead option in the future.

name: Vael Victus
text: Never had a problem with this place, and I have ordered a sub for my boss maybe 10 times. Twice they even help me figure out what the boss actually even wanted. I recommend phoning in your order in for the lunch rush because you can end up spending 15 minutes or more if it's busy enough.

name: Christina Lawsure
text:
I was extremely happy with the service here! The manager was excellent!
I ordered my sandwich and then asked if they have a military discount. The manager, who was at the register, said he could do that for me. Then, when I tried to ‚Ä¶More

name: Nick Meola
text: I never have a problem here. My sandwiches are always 100% the way I ask for it. I do want to say I feel bad for the manager that was there today. She got completely harassed by a girl that claimed there was a screw in her sandwich and she was obviously lying. I think the manager handled it perfectly.

name: Chris Chavarriaga
text: I love this place. The steak does wonders for my pores. I love to walk behind the counter when the staff isn't looking and drizzle the grease from the grill onto my bare chest. It's a magical feeling that I want to experience with my whole ‚Ä¶More

name: Jacqlyn Andolfo
text: Delicious food! 1 employee was extremely nice and gave me a cup for a fountain drink while manager and another employee handled a difficult customer and held up the register for me to purchase said drink. I did pay for the drink once customer finally left

name: Four:Ten Photography
text: I used to order from this D'Angelos all the time,  but the last two times I went their service has been terrible! They turned off their online ordering in the middle of the day on a Friday, and when I tried to call they wouldn't answer the ‚Ä¶More

name: Mike Doran
text: I usually order from here but not any longer.  I ordered a steak and cheese  over the phone and when I arrived they say the guy taking the order didn't know how to use the computer and my order wasn't placed . I was fine with the credit ‚Ä¶More

name: Jennifer Clarke
text: Great place to get food....my favorite is the steak and cheese

name: Scott Birtles
text: I always order online. The crew is always on time and are pleasant when they arrive. Check out the rice bowls. ;)

name: Arnisa Brown
text: Ordered a buffalo chicken wrap with no blue cheese. My wrap was made with the blue cheese when I called a women answered the phone. She had a very nasty attitude and told me it wasn‚Äôt her problem she didn‚Äôt make the sandwich.  Will not be going here if they can‚Äôt follow simple directions.

text: Good on the spot grilled food and more... definitely a fan.

name: Elizabeth Darosa
text: All the employees were happy and they were willing to help you and had patience

name: Denise Freeman
text: I ordered a small number 9 steak with no onions. First of all, there was hardly any steak and then I had to pick out all the onions when I clearly said NO ONIONS

name: renee cabral
text: It's close by in always a good place when I don't feel like cooking. Steak and soup are good.

name: Joseph Thomas
text: Sometimes there is a bit of a wait here, I don't know if they are short staffed because scheduling issues and can't hire enough people. The food is made the way you ask , I have been visiting this location for some time and have never had to return anything.

name: Douglas Goepfert
text: Called ahead and Ordered sandwich with mustard, lettuce and onion. Got sandwich with nothing but hot peppers. Walked back, waited, got another "right "sandwich...technically right...one sliver of onion. I get 30 minutes for lunch, spent 25 dealing with geniuses and still didn't have a decent sandwich....
